title: How A Stolen Backpack In Casablanca Inspired A Novel About Shifting Identity
teaser: The main character in Vendela Vida's new novel is alone in Morocco when her bag with her passport and credit cards is stolen. Vida says The Diver's Clothes Lie Empty was inspired by her own travels.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
